**The Scientific Consensus:**

The International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC), which is part of the World Health Organization (WHO), has classified processed red meat as **Group 1 carcinogen** — meaning it is carcinogenic to humans — and unprocessed red meat as **Group 2A carcinogen** — meaning it is probably carcinogenic to humans.

The key is **moderation** and **dietary balance**.
